title: Winegrape Growing: Spring
description: Management of campus winegrape vineyards in the spring, including canopy manipulation; planting; training; irrigation; nutrient evaluation; fertilization; crop evaluation; disease, insect, vertebrate and weed management. 1 lecture, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: FRSC/WVIT 231; BRAE 340; SS 221; PPSC 321; and STAT 218
